description: Yeehaa is a seasoned tech manager and consultant with a strong background in software engineering and project management. With experience across various industries, Yeehaa has driven significant upgrades and implementations. Their work focuses on ecosystem architecture, innovation, and sustainable design. Yeehaa's blog posts explore themes of interconnected systems, resilience, and the future of technology. They've written about ecosystem architecture across space and time, internet fragmentation, and practicing innovation for planetary rejuvenation. Yeehaa also curated a course on "Grooming Your Ecosystem," emphasizing leadership, adaptability, and creativity.
blurb: Yeehaa, a tech manager and consultant, explores ecosystem architecture and innovation. Their work spans software engineering, project management, and sustainable design, focusing on resilient, interconnected systems for a better future.
